content.detailedDescription:
My 76- year old neighbor, his daughter, and two of their friends were outside talking (9:21pm) when a softball-size, orange-yellow orb sailed past them-going south to north-at a moderate speed. it was not very high. perhaps 30 or 35 degrees from where they stood. the orb traveled in a straight line- no sound, no trail. a few seconds later another orb flew by. then two more, then four or five at once. all were taking the same straight flight path-no arc. an estimated 50 lights went by in the span of 5 minutes. 
i did not witness the event. i did manage to get my neighbor to tell me the story. he's a very credible person. the event took place in the northwest corner of town, by the rum river.
-- has anyone else witnessed these balls of light?
--jim
content.summary: At 9:21 pm yellow-orange balls-50 in total-flew by. one, two, five at a time. four witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i (3 of us) were in our backyard and we noticed a hawk and a crow that got our attention. as we were watching the birds we saw what we initially thought were metallic balloons but then suddenly there were multiple ones and they were appearing out of nowhere. then a red helicopter was seen in the vicinity which sort of hovered then abruptly left. the spheres were changing direction and i believe at one point there were about 20 of them. they were very light reflective and pulsating. i don't believe they were balloons because of the sudden appearance of them and the constant path direction. i thought i was recording on my phone but in my excitement i didn't push the record button and ended up recording my conversation with my family when they had disappeared. this was in the san fernando valley.
content.summary: Multiple spheres san fernando valley

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger in a car traveling west on i-70 from kansas city, missouri.  soon after leaving the city lights of kansas city, i noticed an unusually bright star high in the northern sky.  i was leaning back on the car seat and that particular star was easily in my line of vision as we traveled west.  we were passing through topeka, kansas - on a stretch of i-70 between the first st exit and west gate bridge, which in those days was a dark stretch at night.  i was looking right at the star when it turned red and shot in a straight line into the west at an impossible speed.  it went in a straight line so fast that it disappeared in a fraction of a second.  i was astonished and excited and could not believe what i had just seen.  the driver did not see it.  i did not calm down for a few minutes as it was an amazing thing to witness.  i have no idea what it was but i have never forgotten it.  i have never seen anything move at that speed in the sky - ever.
content.summary: Witnessed a bright star turn red and shoot at incredible speed in a straight line disappearing in a fraction of a second

content.detailedDescription: I was picturing a flag on a building, took around 20 photos and noticed it a minute after it cause it seemed strange. now when i move pictures frame by frame the "object" is moving, scary.
content.summary: I was picturing a flag on a building, took around 20 photos and noticed it a minute after it cause it seemed strange. now when i move pictures frame by frame the "object" is moving, scary.

content.detailedDescription: I was picturing a flag on a building, took around 20 photos and noticed it a minute after it cause it seemed strange. now when i move pictures frame by frame the "object" is moving, scary.
content.summary: I was picturing a flag on a building, took around 20 photos and noticed it a minute after it cause it seemed strange. now when i move pictures frame by frame the "object" is moving, scary.

content.detailedDescription: I had and have been in a homeless situation and had went to this location of  to spend the nights in my truck,earlier date in different location  different spot saw flight,colors  irregular flight travel pattern followed by quick disappearance then on this  of spending the night and while in  truck heard voices type sounds and were sparatic quick bright flashes that had catscan type feeling affects and left a  sore streak like area on my upper stomach,event occured during  self stimulation activity performed by myself.
content.summary: Homeless was staying in truck once saw flying lights later experienced sounds flashes like exray feelings sore across stomach

content.detailedDescription: T or airplane, noticed 3 triangle like objects hovering in the sky, changed direction but hours later, still there
content.summary: 3 triangle like objects hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Bright ball of light appears everyday in different spots near the airport. its super bright and doesn't move other than it spinning in circles and disappearing. neighborhood dogs go crazy barking when it's hovering. when i try to zoom in my camera won't focus and there have been times where my phone completely shuts off, as if the battery has been drained. i see it everyday in different spots.
content.summary: Spinning bright ball appears above the airport everyday in different spots

content.detailedDescription: I was outside sitting having a cigarette watching the sky.  was just looking up when it appeared.  a triangle ufo with 3 lights on each corner, and was dead silent.  simply flew south east to north west at a high rate of speed.  goosebumps and a sense of awe.  left me speechless for a second and called my wife out to see it, but it was gone.  i flew away before my wife could observe it.
content.summary: Three triangle lights traveling at a high rate of speed, could not judge the height or distance

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I walked out the back the door to smoke a cigarette. it was 8:30 and the night was clear and i looked up to see the stars. 

towards the southeasterly direction i noticed movement. an object shaped like a chevron or boomerang flying in a northern direction. the object appeared to be several thousand feet up and good distance away. it had no apparent lights but the whole object seemed to have a very dim, faint glow. it was almost like watching a shadow move across the night sky.

i watched the object for about a minute. it traveled north without changing direction. although the object seemed to be flying lower than a commercial airliner, there was no sound. 

i watched the object till it was out of sight to the northeast.
content.summary: Chevron or boomerang shaped object in the night sky. either faint blue-ish white glow or very faint 5-7 lights along the object.

content.detailedDescription: I just got off of work when i saw it hovering in the sky and thought it was unusual just hovering the way it did and it started to fade out when i got home which took about 30 minutes. i am not sure what it was but just in case someone else may have reported it, i thought i would mention it. i am not ruling out a natural explanation but who knows? it looked almost like a craft of some kind with a glowing light that eventually faded out, but it was still hovering.
content.summary: Light glowed then faded

content.detailedDescription:
Walking my dog, on a very very dark cloudy day, i happen to look up in the sky.
big clouds everywhere you look, except one tiny part in the distance.
if i haden't good eyes (12/10 after laser operation) i might have overlooked it.
for a split 20 to 30 seconds (maybe less) i saw 3 cigar shaped polished metalic appearence going straight, without a noise (at this distance i should hear them if planes).
by the speed of it, it must way faster than a jet plane.
the poor meteorologic conditions forbid me to see them again, and i have never seen them again in a year.

the path the ufos took was the same as those i see always in the night sky, but those have blinking eyes and i grant them for normal planes (going way slower).
content.summary: 3 cigar shaped polishel metalic appearence
While driving noticed very brilliant object traveling at a high rate of speed that then turned and vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from the grocery with my husband and kids. i didn't notice the object i was taking pictures because my son pointed at a cloud that was the color of a rainbow. i didn't notice the object until i got home and zoomed in to one of my pictures. the sun was on the left, the rainbow cloud was in the middle of my picture and the object was on the left. when i zoomed in it looked like two rows of lights.
content.summary: Took pics of a colorful cloud. got home and zoomed in and saw it.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: A black sphere roughly 20 feet in diameter followed an airplane for several minutes over the ocean. it changed positions with regard to the plane frequently, moving closet and further, up and down.
content.summary: 20 foot black sphere following plane.

content.detailedDescription:
Just like a star while there were too many clouds... it wasn´t an airplane, sure, too cloudy..Just sparkling over the buildings and throuh the clouds...But very far...And just went far and far more...And disappeared...Like 10 minutes.
any video would be truthfull. was too far....
content.summary: Just a star like light while thare were too many clouds to be a star

content.detailedDescription: I observed a bright white spherical or blimp shaped object slowly ascend near a single cloud in otherwise blue sky at a fairly slow speed. the object caught my attention because while it appeared to be far away it was clearly not a typical aircraft with wings or tail. it appeared to ascend slowly for a couple of seconds from the position where i started watching it moving maybe a couple of degrees. it then changed direction and speed rather abruptly and then moved west (left as i was watching it from south of its position) at very high speed. there were a number of planes in the area but the object appeared to be moving maybe 10x faster from a near stationary position. when it flew west it moved very smoothly and at high speed. until it changed direction and moved west i thought maybe it was a balloon. as it moved west i was really focused on it and it was definitely not a bird or anything else with wings. the whole event lasted somewhere between 5 and 10 seconds. in researching this i've seen a similar report in the same area on the same day.
content.summary: Bright white spherical or blimp shaped object slowly ascended then made abrupt direction change and moved west at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was enjoying a bonfire with my husband in our backyard. prior to the sun setting i had noticed a low flying helicopter. i dismissed it because fresno's police have helicopters that frequent the area. as the stars came out and the sky darkened, i still noticed the helicopter flying over the same radius of about 4-5 blocks in a circle, sometimes right over the e. side of our neighbors back yard not 200 ft above. that's when i became interested so i walked to the back n. side of our yard to look down the alley way towards the sky in the direction the helicopter was circling. i watched the helicopter and now a small white,maybe two passenger plane, that had also been circling the area before the sun went down as well, flying towards two red objects that were abruptly changing direction in what looked like evasive maneuvers to avoid or distract the helicopter and plane. the two objects were bright solid red and were changing directions quickly as we watched them and the helicopter and plane chasing them or observing them, disappear out of vision to the ne.  

they disappeared and we went inside to watch the video in awe! i uploaded it from my husband's phone and the still image of the video was literally zoomed in on the two red objects. shaking, adrenaline pumping, having just witnessed something like never before,i heard the helicopter return! so, i bolted back out with my husbands phone and proceeded to capture the helicopter circling around the blinking red and white, hovering, moving objects that are constantly changing direction abruptly and disappear and reappear as the helicopter gets closer towards them.  i continued to record multiple videos showing the objects hovering and blinking and proceeding in a nw direction until out of vision. to the naked eye, i could only see blinking or solid light emitting objects. however, as i uploaded and watched the videos to my computer i noticed something very strange. 

while the helicopter is circling, whatever is seemingly directly above the power lines that in the video is present that i did not see outside. a triangle shaped object with a red misty hue,resembling a jet with a blinking small white light at the tip of it and larger ball of white light on the middle lower side of it. as the helicopter circles in the video you can see it actually pass behind the object showing its shape and as this happens the smaller white blinking objects surrounding disappear and reappear as the helicopter directly seems to pass them. 

after i uploaded all of the videos and watched and analyzed them last night. the initial video that had the two red objects being chased by the helicopter and plane was nowhere to be found. not even on my husbands phone. fortunately though i did take multiple videos that can be pieced together for evidence.
content.summary: Multiple red and white blinking and pulsating lights hovering  disappearing and reappearing surrounded by circling helicopter and plane.

content.detailedDescription:
1. we were in our 4th floor apartment watching television

2. i looked out at our view of the sky and noticed lights in the distance that looked like three lights  in a row non blinking and didn't budge like normal aircraft.

3. i knew that this was a ufo and was certain because it resembled nothing i have seen before. 

4. it slowly moved in our direction west to east from above la jolla shores, as i filmed it it began to hove over us. its lights were solid and did not blink, except from one light that was red that would blink unlike other aeronautical blinking lights i have seen. there were two rectangular light illuminations on the side of the triangle that were located at the tip of a corner appearing to be a sort of cockpit. it did leave any trails, make any sounds when it traveled by.

5. my reaction was of gratitude and surprise. i was more annoyed that i couldn't get a decent adjustment on my camera, nor did i think i had time to set up a tripod. 

6. it eventually flew over our apartment building out of sight.
content.summary: It was black and moved slowely without being effected by turbulance. it had three lights on the bottom that didn't blink, and what looked like to on the side point of the triangle, one random red light

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from school i first noticed the object while moving into my close  e object was moving in a straight line , it moved in straight line all the at through . when i saw it it didint worry me as i believe in aliens and don't believe the cause harm and i lost sight when trees where covering it up .
content.summary: 3 lights in a shape of a on its side triangle ., they were white and the point was flashing fm red to white red to white continuously

content.detailedDescription:
last night in-between 5:15pm and 5:45pm i saw what i thought was a star except it had blinking white lights and was heading north west till it got near me and my wife it had a red blinking light in the center of the 2 white lights go off when we started talking about the thing and pointing at it, it appeared to hover a few seconds and started moving towards us so we took off down the bike trail along the san diego river (this is where it was fling over). 
      as we went up along the trail and turned back around to go home the u.F.O. continued its new course due east away from us, opposite of its original path almost as if it was patrolling the area.  
      now that wasn't the only one we seen i must have counted about 6 different ones just in the local mile to 3 mile radius, and i also saw more blinking lights just like what we saw on the u.F.O. that was over the river but i couldn't say 100% that they were all the same things except for the face that they all even seemed to be patrolling different areas apart from one another.
      i hope we weren't the only ones who saw this last night but we probably were there is a good bit of strange phenomenon that happens up in the sky's of ocean beach. everyone's unfortuneatly probably too stoned to take notice and or action.
                                
            szin n.   & joy b.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: my wife and i saw several ufos and one of them responded to what seemed like us talking and pointing at it.

content.detailedDescription:
i saw a gleaming light. it didn't flash, but was constantly lit up.

it was moving north-east and all of a sudden, it made an abrupt turn to direct north.

it had all the characteristics of an ufo, but it was so far away, and my eyes are going bad, i really couldn't tell for sure.
content.summary: Glowing light changes direction

content.detailedDescription: While walking my dog i looked up at the stars and observed a slow pulsing red and yellow light moving from west to east at an unusually high rate of speed.  it traveled about half way across the sky then instantly vanished. there were airplanes in the area and it looked nothing like any of those lights. i watched the sky for a short period to see if it would reappear.  it did not.
content.summary: Pulsing red and yellow light at high speed, vanishing instantly

content.detailedDescription: I was eating dinner with my fiance in saint paul when i heard this super loud rumbling above the house. it sounded like a helicopter had just landed on top of the house. i ran outside to see what it was when i got outside in the distance about a mile or so away i saw this black or dark gray like circular disc that had about 6 lights on it blinking and 7 black unmarked helicopters surrounding in a line. all 8 objects were moving a steady distance in a straight path when all of a sudden the disc took a sharp turn and just vanished. i kept watching tje helicopters that then retracted in a straight line and continued off into the distance. about a month before that i was driving down 94 east with my fiance and saw the same 7 black unmarked helicopters traveling in a straight line one after the other.  i am still just in awe. in the picture i cropped it on instagram to see if there was any markings on the closet helicopter.
content.summary: I heard a large rumbling i looked outside and saw 7 black unmarled helicopters surrounding a disc like ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I am not sure if this something out of the ordinary,  although i have never seen any thing like it before.
i live in rural southeastern washington state. this evening when i let the dog out, while waiting, i scanned the night sky. usual planes in the distance. i heard jet noise and looked straight up to see a jet chasing an orange light.
the jet was near enough above me to see the wing lights and the red flashing light. the orange light seemed to be silent with nothing flashing. the jet was about 2 jet lengths behind the light. they had come guickly from the west and headed east. i lost sight as they went over the house.
the sound quickly dissapated as fast as it had started, leaving  me to believe they were moving quite fast.
thank you for taking the time to hear my story.
content.summary: Jet chasing orange ball of light

content.detailedDescription: My wife was closing the patio door blinds at 10:15 pm when she saw an unusually bright star like light in the north west sky just above the horizon. she called to me and we observed the object for 30 minutes with seven power binoculars before deciding to file this report. the object appeared to have a large pulsating bright white light. below that were several smaller randomly flashing red, green, and blue lights. i first thought it to be an approaching aircraft since we are near an airport. the object remained hovering at an azimuth of about 22 degrees and at a constant compass bearing of 320 magnetic. the object did not move closer or further away throughout our observation.
content.summary: Observed what first appeared to be unusually bright star. watched it stationary through binoculars and saw large bright pulsating white light with several smaller flashing red green and blue lights. at one point saw edge of disc like object.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking across campus from the student parking lot to the student center. i was looking up at the stars like i always do. when i reached the quad area i saw 7 red lights in v formation. the end two hovered around the end of the v then went into place before the entire v shot off and disappeared. it was a clear night, no clouds.
content.summary: 7 red lights in v formation. the end two hovered around the end of the v then went into place before the entire v shot off and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Thank you for reviewing this case. i am also a mufon member. please do not dismiss due to the sound on this video, i will explain this odd event, i did not want to modify the video in any way to make it not credible. 

in september a week or 2 after coming back from las vegas nevada my fiance and i experienced alot of bizarre events. during our trip to las vegas, being interested in the truth in ebe's we drove out to rachel nevada, visiting the "black mailbox" i left behind an old student id card (not valid with an old address) after visiting the black mailbox we continued on our way to the back entrance of area 51 and got as close to the gate as lawfully possible. as we walked to the gate jokingly i said to my fiance, little do they know that we know the truth. we then came back to wv and just a week or 2 after our trip. my fiance was on the back porch at night (approx time at top) she saw these very low triangular orb set glide across the sky, she then yelled for me to come out. i can describe the object or objects too low to be an airplane and absolutely silent to be a helicopter. usually helicopters have red flashing or white flashing lights. this was just 3,4 or 5 solid white lights in complete silence. they orbs did not hang around too much and the video was a last second record, so its a bit shaky. the orbs slowly disapeared behind a wooded area, twords the end you may think the lights are flashing but its just the lights shining in and out of trees. *****now let me explain the sound*****, after we got done recording it i decided to upload it to facebook and after uploading it to facebook, because i like to educate the public best of my knowledge, for some odd reason, facebook added this most bizarre sound i've ever heard. facebook cant integrate sound into videos you upload.. my fiance and i are very serious on this topic so neither of us would be so arrogant to crack a joke. to this day i still cannot figure out how the audio got added to it or why, to make it a bit more credible, i'm a systems engineer, i live, eat, breathe technology. 

some unrelated bizarre happenings few days later after seeing this ufo, for 1 day and 1 day only, talking on the phone with my fiance, almost seemed like some staticy noise with odd sounds in the background, almost like two phone lines crossed over like the old cordless phones. we were using cellphones. it never happened again after that day... i feel like (not being paranoid) i was being profiled some how and some way by the id i left back at the black mailbox.. 

if you have any questions please let me know, i'm happy to help disclose the truth to better mankind.
content.summary: Ufo - weirton west virginia triangle orb like object shortly after getting close to area 51 only a 1-2 weeks prior (do not dismiss due to sound will explain in details)

content.detailedDescription: I was pumping gas and while i was waiting for the tank to fill i felt a disturbing feeling of being watched.  i looked for a fragment of a second at the sky, as the sun was setting, i took a picture of what was fragment of light.  you can see it in both images as it is in different places to the right of the sunset, past the tree in the photo.
content.summary: I was pumping gas and felt like i was being watched.  i stopped pumping gas to take a picture of the sunset. when i looked at my image i saw the attached.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home on a clear night, approaching stop sign in rural area noted brightly lit craft flying very slowly directly towards me at low altitude. the white spotlights were very bright and spaced widely apart, making a helicopter unlikely so i stopped at the intersection to observe what seemed like a strange phenomenon. it took about three minutes to reach me, traveling less than a mile. as it got closer i saw a blinking red light on the nose and thought "plane". but it was so slow, low and silent. moments before it would have been overhead, it made a perfect ninety degree turn. at that point i could see its underbelly clearly. it was a perfect black triangle, slightly wider at the back than the sides (triangle tip facing forward for flight) with white and red line of lights along the back flashing in a sequence back and forth. shortly after it turned it traveled behind the treeline and i continued on my way home.
content.summary: Triangle ufo with two spotlights and disco lights. slow approach directly towards me, then a ninety degree turn.
